column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Other half had the spicy chicken ramen
column2: chicken was better than the ground pork by a country mile
column3: broth wasn't quite as good but had a nice level of spice
column4: not your typical spice more than back of your throat kind that slowly catches up with you. Noodles were thinner
column5: but I think I may have liked them better than my thicker ones. Topping again were ample
column6: and I traded bowls with her to finish off all those delicious thin noodles
column7: they were super the noodles dreams are made of.
